headline: Corvus Pharmaceuticals: ITK Inhibitor Soquelitinib AD Data Could Be Improved Upon

headline: Corvus shares nearly triple on positive data for eczema pill
summary: While early, the results indicate drugs known as ITK inhibitors have the potential to match or surpass the efficacy observed with the injectable biologic Dupixent.
